# Stranger Things API - Context for LLMs

> This file provides context for AI language models and crawlers about the Stranger Things API project.

## Project Overview

**Name:** Stranger Things API  
**Type:** Free, Open-Source RESTful API  
**Purpose:** Providing comprehensive data about the Stranger Things universe  
**Author:** Jose Alvarez Dev  
**License:** MIT  
**Repository:** https://github.com/JoseAlvarezDev/Stranger-Things-API  
**Documentation:** https://strangerthingsapi.com/api/docs  

## What This API Provides

The Stranger Things API offers the following data resources:

### Characters (25+)
- Main characters from all 4 seasons
- Includes: name, age, gender, occupation, status, powers, quotes
- High-quality portrait images in WebP format
- Example: Eleven, Mike Wheeler, Jim Hopper, Dustin Henderson

### Creatures (10+)
- Creatures from the Upside Down
- Includes: name, origin, abilities, weaknesses, threat level
- Example: Demogorgon, Mind Flayer, Demodogs, Vecna

### Episodes (34)
- All episodes from seasons 1-4
- Includes: title, synopsis, air date, director, duration
- Organized by season

### Locations (20+)
- Key locations from Hawkins and beyond
- Includes: name, type, description, status
- Example: Hawkins Lab, Starcourt Mall, The Upside Down

### Quotes (50+)
- Memorable quotes from the series
- Linked to characters and episodes
- Example: "Friends don't lie." - Eleven

## API Features

- **No Authentication Required**: Completely open access
- **RESTful Design**: Standard HTTP methods (GET)
- **Pagination**: All list endpoints paginated (default 20, max 50)
- **Filtering**: Search by multiple parameters
- **Rate Limiting**: 100 req/15min general, 30 req/min for random endpoints
- **Interactive Documentation**: Swagger UI at /api/docs
- **OpenAPI Spec**: Available at /api/openapi.json

## Base URL

```
https://strangerthingsapi.com/api
```

## Key Endpoints

| Endpoint | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `/api/characters` | All characters (paginated) |
| `/api/characters/:id` | Single character by ID |
| `/api/characters/random` | Random character |
| `/api/creatures` | All creatures (paginated) |
| `/api/creatures/:id` | Single creature by ID |
| `/api/creatures/random` | Random creature |
| `/api/episodes` | All episodes (paginated) |
| `/api/episodes/:id` | Single episode by ID |
| `/api/locations` | All locations (paginated) |
| `/api/quotes` | All quotes (paginated) |
| `/api/quotes/random` | Random quote |
| `/api/stats` | API statistics |
| `/api/health` | Health check |
| `/api/docs` | Interactive documentation |

## Example API Response

```json
{
  "id": 1,
  "name": "Eleven",
  "real_name": "Jane Hopper",
  "nickname": "El",
  "age": 15,
  "gender": "Female",
  "occupation": "Student",
  "portrayed_by": "Millie Bobby Brown",
  "powers": ["Telekinesis", "Remote Viewing", "Mind Control"],
  "status": "Alive",
  "portrait_path": "/images/characters/eleven.webp",
  "quotes": ["Friends don't lie.", "Mouth-breather."],
  "seasons": [1, 2, 3, 4]
}
```

## Technical Stack

- **Runtime**: Node.js 16+
- **Framework**: Express.js 5
- **Security**: Helmet, rate-limit, hpp
- **Documentation**: Swagger/OpenAPI 3.0
- **Format**: JSON responses
- **Images**: WebP format, CDN-served
